title: Snooki rocks tie-dye jumpsuit and Louis Vuitton bag out in NYC
text:
Nicole 'Snooki' Polizzi cut a stylish figure when she was glimpsed stepping out in New York City this Wednesday.

The 31-year-old Jersey Shore icon wore a tie-dye jumpsuit that emphasized her curves, throwing a black wrap over the look.

Snooki, who is 4feet8, balanced on a pair of black platform boots and accessorized her ensemble with a bulging Louis Vuitton handbag.

Out and about: Nicole 'Snooki' Polizzi cut a stylish figure when she was glimpsed stepping out in New York City this Wednesday

Her outing comes just weeks after her pal and Jersey Shore co-star Mike 'The Situation' Sorrentino was released from his Catskills jail.

The reality TV hunk, whose curvy figure in recent years has earned him the nickname 'Big Daddy Sitch,' became a free man on September 12.

Mike and his brother Marc were sentenced to serve time last October for tax fraud associated with nearly $9 million of income.

City girl: The 31-year-old Jersey Shore icon wore a tie-dye jumpsuit that emphasized her curves, throwing a black wrap over the look

He was engaged at the time to his college sweetheart Lauren Pesce, and they married on November 1 before he surrendered to police in mid-January.

Near the end of August, Snooki joined Jersey Shore co-stars Jenni 'JWoww' Farley, Deena Cortese and Angelina Pivarnick to protest for a early release.

They picketed outside what they apparently thought was the White House but was actually the Treasury Building, a TMZ video showed.

On the go: Snooki, who is 4'8", balanced on a pair of black platform boots and accessorized her ensemble with a bulging Louis Vuitton handbag

The Situation was apparently rubbing shoulders at the Federal Correctional Facility Otisville with his fellow fraudster, Fyre Festival impresario Billy McFarland.

The dynamic duo settled down for games of scrabble with hacker George Garofano, whose work led to the leak of Jennifer Lawrence and Kate Upton's nude photos.

Jersey Shore dreamboats Vinny Guadagnino and DJ Pauly D dished as much on former The View star Jenny McCarthy's SiriusXM radio show.
description: The 31-year-old Jersey Shore icon wore a tie-dye jumpsuit that emphasized her curves, throwing a black wrap over the look.
